description:
General use 10-point crampons for light mountaineering, glacier walking and trekking. With fewer, tamer points and lighter weight than heavier-duty crampons, the G10s excel in easy to moderate mountain terrain. The new EVO binding is thinner while being just as strong, dropping 14g in weight per pair over the previous version.

  • Made of chomoly steel with a classic 10-point design
  • EVO binding is simpler and lighter than previous bindings system
  • Strap system accommodates all boots, even those without welts
  • Flexible centre bar works with flexible footwear
  • Dynamic anti-balling plates prevent snow and ice buildup
name: Grivel G10 New-Classic EVO Crampons
